title: QUOKKA Floor Puzzles For 3 4 Year Olds - 60x90 cm 48 pc Giant Jigsaws For Children Age 4 5 - Large Educational Construction Toys for 3 6 yo - Premium Gift Box with Sturdy Handle & Magnetic Closure
features: LUXURIOUS GIFT BOX WITH LEATHER HANDLE: QUOKKA kids puzzles ages 3-5 come in a premium storage box with magnetic closure; an elegant design makes it ideal for gifting; perfect for birthdays, holidays, etc; a standout present for kids and families

GIANT FLOOR PUZZLE WITH UNIQUE PIECES: Almost 50-piece puzzle expands to 2x3 feet, creating a large floor puzzle experience; jumbo puzzles ensure every piece fits perfectly with no mismatches, promoting confidence and keeping kids engaged longer

PREMIUM PUZZLES FOR REPEATED PLAY: Our large piece puzzles for kids are built for endless fun, featuring thick pieces and highly detailed scenes that keep kids coming back; engaging images of every puzzle encourage repeated use and independent play

IMMERSIVE SCENES FOR LONGER PLAY: we create kids puzzles with extended playtime that encourage storytelling, exploration; due to vibrant thoughtfully crafted scenes with many details they work great as puzzles for 5 year old or puzzles for 3 year old

PERFECT GIFT FOR HOLIDAYS & EDUCATIONAL FUN: Whether for birthdays, learning milestones, or special occasions, this puzzle for 4 year old makes an exciting and engaging activity; combines simple fun and education in one premium package
description: Product Description Foster cognitive development, spatial reasoning, and fine motor skills in an exciting, hands-on way. Learning has never been this much fun! Watch as your child explores, problem-solves, and learns valuable skills while piecing together these captivating jigsaw wonders!
